item.title: The Source of My Social Sciences Hate
item.description: Recently I was reading a beautiful interview of Amartya Sen done by The Harvard Gazette. You can read my higlights over at hypothes.is This reminded me of the first time I read a paper by Amartya Sen. Back when I was in the ninth grade I was required to do a project for my Social Studies class. The topic allotted to me was “Should we have caste based reservation?” Heavy stuff ðŸ˜©, especially for my 14-year-old ass.
